data.title: Delicious Food in South Jordan
data.text: We love to go here for a treat. They have a nice variety of desserts for all ages and likes. just stop-in a get a "Thank You " Treat for a friend or neighbor. They have friendly  helpful staff.

data.title: A great Place to Visit!
data.text: The variety of food is really amazing!  From breakfast baked goodies, to soups, salads and sweet treats - everything looks amazing!  Had a treat and the chicken wild rice soup and both were very good with generous  portions and rolls!

data.title: Second best eclairs in the city
data.text: The service is slow and tends to get orders wrong but the bakery items are great! I find that most baked goods look better than they taste but not at Schmidt's.

data.title: Staff was rude
data.text: We walked in to see what was inside this cute place. It smelled Devine, we saw beautiful pastries and gorgeous cakes. We asked for a menu and she (blonde lady) rudely said this is it and pointed to the wall. No smile, no can I help you, so we walked out and they lost our business.

data.title: Eat across the street
data.text: I ordered the turkey club panini and it came without the bacon that was listed as an ingredient on the menu board. We were told that we had to ask for the bacon. That isn't right and so we were brought 3 slices of bacon. Since we had two sandwiches I asked if each sandwich gets 1 and a half pieces. No, we finally got. 3 more pieces of bacon. We ordered our meal to go and it came on a plate. So it went back to the kitchen. The sandwich was good but the potato salad was bad. I will go for the pastries but not for a meal.

data.title: sweet tooth time
data.text: what a great place to get treats everything I've tried is great and priced right I stop in 2-3 times a week they also have great food also you can get.

data.title: Great pastries and a good price
data.text: We love the mint brownies and the cookies, especially the sugar cookies.  The birthday cakes are also well prepared and not very expensive.

user_location.name: Salt Lake City, Utah, United States

data.title: YUMMY
data.text: This local pastry shop has amazing eclairs, cookies and bread. The South Jordan location also serves sandwiches made to order.

data.title: The friendly feel of a neighborhood bakery.
data.text: Schmidt's Pastry Cottage has the friendly feel of a neighborhood bakery.  They do not carry as many types of breads as a traditional bakery, but they do have an excellent assortment of pastries.  Their German chocolate cake is the best in the valley as are their cinnamon rolls.  They also prepare sandwiches for lunch.

data.title: Good bakery..
data.text: We were having a client event and they did a good job of providing us what we needed.. Price was fair and quality was good.

data.title: Fantastic Bakery and Deli!
data.text:
I have always loved Schmidt's Pastries. I typically go to the one on Redwood or the one on 21st. When we passed this one and saw they also have breakfast and lunch, we had to try it!

I have been for both breakfast and lunch and it's just fantastic. It's not a full service restaurant. It's counter service and then they bring your food to your table. The breakfast food was tasty with big portions. The lunch was also fantastic, with delicious salads with fresh veggies and awesome dressing. The sandwiches are on Schmidt's fantastic fresh, thick sliced bread. With high quality deli meats and fresh veggies, it was a fantastic sandwich.

Now, the desserts. Really you can't go wrong with any dessert you order. Everything is beautiful and tasty. Some of their most popular items are their specialty brownies and their eclairs. But really, their donuts are great and so fresh. Their cakes and mini cakes are always fresh and delicious.

Really you can order anything there and know it's going to be delicious.

Breakfast cuts off early, at 10:30 and they aren't open Sunday. So no sleeping in, lazy mornings if you want breakfast at Schmidt's. I think they would do better to serve breakfast until later, or all day. I know we would go more often if we could go later and get breakfast.

data.title: Good selection and always fresh.
data.text:
I'm always looking for a good pastry shop like they have in Europe and have yet to find one. I was excited when I heard that Schmidt's was opening down the road from work because I have heard good things and I bring donuts to the office every Friday. I've been by a couple of times but I went back to my regular donut shop. If your looking for eclairs and other harder to find items, this is the place. For regular donuts, there are better out there.
They do have good sandwiches and other lunch items and we will go there occasionally for lunch followed by a sweet treat,

data.title: Best Burthday Cakes
data.text: Our family has been buying Birthday cakes at Schmidts for over thirty years. My children now adults still ask me for a cake from schmidts for their birthdays and my grandchildren. I have never been disappointed and we all have our favorites. I have had chocolate cake with mocha icing and filling for my birthday every year since 1987. The cookies, pastries and breads have always been excellent.

data.title: Greatest Eclairs Around
data.text: Schmidt's is so yummy! My favorite place for eclairs ever!  They have all sorts of tasty bakery items.  The cookies are great and it is definitely my go to place for cakes!  Oh my! Now I want an eclair!

data.title: When they first opened this location
data.text:
I was really excited for this location to open.  I had a store not too far from there, so I watched the construction with anticipation.  (I don't remember exactly when I ate there.)

When we were finally able to go with my daughters, my sandwich was nothing at all to write home about.

My daughter's sandwich had a piece of a plastic cap in it.  I don't know if it came off the mustard dispenser, or where it could have come from.

When we pointed out the foreign object in my daughter's sandwich the staff was less than apologetic.

I would have otherwise given them a 2-3 score for the food quality.

I have not returned since.

data.title: Too Sweet for my taste
data.text: We got cupcakes for a family birthday from here and they were simply too sweet - too much sugar and icing.  They have a great selection but everything we have tried have ben too sweet for our liking.

data.title: Lots of hype
data.text: Have been a few times. My mom raves about their salads, but I have found its just average,  and their deserts are very ... deceiving. Lots of dried out crusty pastry type desserts. Might be its not my type of treat?

data.title: Best Almond Horns
data.text: This bakery has really good baked goods, we enjoy the almond horns and other marzipan items. They also offer lunch, not high on my list.

data.title: The deserts are where its at
data.text: The food here is good, but the deserts are what you REALLY come here for.  The eclairs and the mint brownies are a must.  The service here has always left me wondering if they even know I'm here.

data.title: This place is Amazing
data.text:
So many pastries not enough time to try them all.
You name it they make it here, everything we tried was incredible, The german chocolate cake
melted in our mouths.
They also offer breakfast and lunch as well as all the incredible Pastries,cookies, birthday cakes as well as beautiful wedding cakes.
I have ordered cakes and pastries before and they are always perfect.
